title: 求大佬看看什么问题~！~！~
txt_content:
29.01 17:34:34 [服务器] 错误 Chunk file at 43,146 is in the wrong location; relocating. (Expected 43, 146, got 40, 143)29.01 17:34:34 [服务器] 错误 Chunk file at 41,140 is in the wrong location; relocating. (Expected 41, 140, got 49, 140)29.01 17:34:34 [服务器] 错误 Encountered an unexpected exception29.01 17:34:34 [服务器] 信息 net.minecraft.util.ReportedException: 载入 NBT data29.01 17:34:34 [服务器] 错误 SEVERE SAVE 错误


然后服务器就崩溃，重启

replies.txt_content: 求大佬，出现报错。，直接崩溃
